resources.string: MAIN MENU \n \nUsed to select options to proceed with the application.
NOW PLAYING \n \nThis activity shows the information of the song currently being played along with buttons to play/pause and go to the next song.
MY SONGS \n \nThis activity displays the user\'s songs in a scrollable list that can be selected to play. The Now Playing TextView is clickable to go to the Now Playing Activity.
ALBUMS \n \nThis activity displays the user\'s albums in a scrollable list that can be clicked to show songs from that album.
ARTISTS \n \nThis activity displays the artists the user\'s songs are composed by in a scrollable list that can be clicked to show songs from that artist.
PLAYLISTS \n \nThis activity displays the playlists made by the user in a scrollable list that can be clicked to show songs in that playlist.

BUY MORE MUSIC \n \nThis activity opens an activity showing various songs/artists/albums the user can download. When checking out, the user has to pay for the chosen music. This Android Pay API can be used to allow this transaction to happen.
